website_summaries.verdict: A WiFi-enabled infrared heater that can be wall-mounted to save space.
pros: Has a remote, or you can control it through their WiFi-enabled app
Can use it as a standing heater or mount it to the wall
Ships with feet, mounting hardware, and a level
cons: Some reports of this heater arriving broken or missing parts

customer_reviews.title: WiFi model does not come with feet.
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, if you do not plan to wall mount this unit and you buy the WiFi model, you will need to purchase the feet from the manufacturer’s website for $9. Otherwise I’m quite pleased so far. Quality is good. Unit is quiet. Heats up fast. WiFi was easy to set up, stays connected and reconnects automatically after power interruption. Will edit this later if for some reason it fails to perform when the temps drop in the next few weeks. Mid winter update : it’s still great. Happy with it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ninwest

customer_reviews.title: Compact but good heat output
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact the design is. It's light weight & can easily be moved. It's not the ugly, boxy style like most infrared heaters. I attached the legs so it could be more portable, but it appears it will easily attach to the wall as well. I was pleasantly surprised by how much heat it generates. The thermostat allows it to shut off when it's reached the desired temperature so that it doesn't run continually.
customer_reviews.author: ARenee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Great value and great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence, then im pushing you over! I love this product! Its super lightweight and not bulky. It runs quietly, verses other heaters that make a loud noise when they run. The included level made it incredibly easy to mount and keep out of reach of our wandering toddler. I will definitely be buying more for the rest of my house! Update: after several months of use, i can now see that my winter electric bills on average have been about 13% than last year using other space heaters, and our home is much more comfortable! Ive bought two so far and will be buying more for other rooms of my house!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what they say ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is an ok product. But, here are my concerns: 1. Remote control is not very strong - doesn't work from the usual distances that others do 2. NO feet were included! 3. Wifi app was confusing - too many with the same name - some from "unknown" sources so I didn't want to download 4. Wall hanging included eight screws but the instructions only included four. Hum. Overall, I'll keep it as it's small and easy to have in a room, it does heat ok, just not as well as they suggest, and because returns are too much work, but I wish I'd have purchased a different heater. :(
customer_reviews.author: Njm

customer_reviews.title: An excellent heater. Safe
customer_reviews.text: An excellent heater. Safe, quiet, lightweight, and does a great job of heating the room. The remote is handy. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: King Gut

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOO HISS FAIL
customer_reviews.text: If negative stars was a thing, this would be the only product I would give them to. Easy to mount. Came with a little level attached to paper as a cheat sheet in case you can't put screws into a wall straight. Doesn't ACTUALLY heat your house. I had it turned up to 90° for DAYS and it didn't get over 54 in my 400 SQ FT LIVING ROOM. This is the most disappointment and discomfort for our household, might I mention, that I have experienced this far from Amazon. Boo. Hiss. Fail. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Emm Ettinger

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for what I needed, to keep a bathroom warm in the winter. Is very quiet, and the thermostat is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cronkleton

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money, Heats Wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I hate my local city utility company. They provide the gas not Columbia and they are notorious for turning people's services off after only three weeks since the last payment and not the standard month. So to give them the old "duck doo", I bought this. I keep my house set at 60 degrees....even on the coldest of days.....and this baby does the rest! It keeps my room warm and the room next to mine, the family room. It works wonders. It has helped me save money and stick it to the immoral local city utility. It's a win win! The two main rooms where it is located are very comfortable and the rest of the house is acceptably warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to heat my bathroom while it's under construction and it has surpassed my expectations. It's very quiet-the low fan is almost silent and the high fan is quiet enough for use in a bedroom. I like the fact that you can hang it on the wall, or place the feet on it and stand it on the floor. It will be moving to my bedroom once construction is finished, so I anticipate loving the remote control feature. Thank you for making such a useful and quiet heater!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sertich

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold room or not warm enough large area
customer_reviews.text: Used to offset boiler usage in small house and I ran it consistently over last winter ..... very affective and had minimal impact on electrical bill .... super efficient
customer_reviews.author: James Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: So far everything to love....
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet...I mean really quiet. The only noise that's audible is the click when the thermostat has clicked on/off. It takes up very little space and we have ours on the floor utilizing the legs that came with it. It moves the hot air across the bathroom floor for at least 10-12 feet and makes it very nice when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Control your heat from anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 4 other space heaters before deciding on this Heat Storm Wifi unit, please note this is for supplemental heating and really not meant to replace your current system. I have this unit placed on my third floor den that's approximately 500 sq ft, it has no problem keeping my the space within 65-70. You can also set a schedule through the app so there's no need for a thermostat, i set mine to go off an hour before I get home and to turn off once the room reaches 80. Pro's Wifi enabled - you can control this heater from anywhere price point, this was the only unit i could find with wifi and built in thermostat
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: Great programmability.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I’m able to program it to turn on automatically at 3am so that my kitchen is nice and warm in the morning and program it to turn off automatically at 6:30am so that I don’t Have to remember to turn it off before I leave. I would have given it 5-stars if the phone app was not too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This space heater was a wonderful surprise. I needed to heat a medium-sized master bedroom above a minimally insulated garage (unheated). The master bedroom was FREEZING. I did a lot of research and ultimately selected this unit due to its actual thermostat and positive reviews. The unit takes time to heat a room (several hours if you are starting with a room ~40 degrees F), but ultimately performs excellently and smoothly. There is no odor, noise is appropriate (not too loud), and it simply works just like a standard thermostat-regulated heater (not a space heater that requires constant manual fine-tuning on an arbitrary dial). Highly recommend and plan to use long term.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mok

customer_reviews.title: Not that energy efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Draws 1470w at the wall. When you lower the temp it drops to 740w, but still not that efficient - especially if you compare it with oil filled heater. This one is Infra Red, but it has a vent inside and it's loud, turns on and off drops and raises volume. I like the features of this heater - smart home connectivity, it may work ok for someone with cheaper electricity rates.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lubensky

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one of their products
customer_reviews.text: I boughttwo and both didn't work, I just kept getting errors. I have one of their other heaters and it works great. But I won't order another one, plus I never got a refund from Amazon after I returned the second one and I had to pay to send the second one back, so I am out 160 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I live in a basement and it's always cold down there. My basement is very spacious and the ceilings are very very high. I set it to 77 degrees and when I woke up and walked into the living room the entire space was so warm and comfortable. It's small but powerful. It really does the job. Not to mention that it's very quiet, doesn't have that annoying fan background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Yirsiris Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: New 2019 Model Is The Worse
customer_reviews.text: New 2019 model is the worse. The LED display turns off after 5 minutes. Very inconvenient that you cannot see what is current temperature in the room and what speed the heater is running. You have to get up, find the remote or walk to the heater to turn the LED display on then 5 minutes later it turns itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Insanely Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have this in a finished basement in my house (it's an in-law apartment). Approximately 1,200 square feet. I can't believe this thing keeps the entire basement warm. I have it near the entrance and somehow it even heats my bathroom. This is the best money I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LifeGQ

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to install, quite, efficient
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to install, quite, efficient. Comes with legs so can be used either as portable or wall mount. Has removable and cleanable air filters. 3 foot cord and can be mounted so cord does not show. remote, or manual controls, Display shows room temp, and set temp. has 2 modes full and economy.The thermostat functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This item made us scared our bedroom was going to start on fire, it smelled like it was burning. We returned it for the more expensive white one. We originally ordered the black because that was the color I wanted not because it was cheaper, but you can’t risk safety. Go with the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The most AWESOME heater I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could. These heaters are lightweight, can be mounted on a wall. They can be picked up and moved at anytime, even while operating. I have had many a space heater, but not ever one as good at the three Heat Storms I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Acres

customer_reviews.title: WiFi unit MUsT he wall mounted -  no other way to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with feet as the description indicates. The WIFi unit must be wall attached before being able to use it. I was intending to try it out to see how well it heated and where in my room to wall mount it. There is NO option to run it without screwing it into your wall. This is an issue that should be clearly detailed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E Chu

customer_reviews.title: Wondeful unit if you don't get a defective one; don't expect good customer service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these, separately. The first works wonderfully, quiet, efficient. The wifi setup was challenging but great once we got it done. The second unit makes incredibly loud, high pitched noises. Contacted amazon who instructed me to email the the company for a replacment per the warranty that comes with the unit. Angela from heatstorm wrote back a a few days later a 2 sentence email stating they dont do that, contact amazon for a replacment. So am trying to go back through amazon again. Giving a lesser review until the situation is rectified. If just based on the first unit would give 5 stars, thats the difference customer service makes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. My husband and I live in a 300ft tiny house. We had been heating with small electric heaters and they never would keep a set temperature. It was either to cold or to hot. I love this heater. It heats the tiny home by itself. I can set it at 68 with my echo dot and once it reaches the temp it will power down and run on a lower speed to hold the temp. It doesn't just shut off and wait until it's cold before it comes back on. I put it in the middle of my home and it heats perfectly. My favorite purchase this year.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I liked the design and that it was wifi. We didn't really set it up when we first received it because it was still summer and too warm outside to use it. Well, now it is fall and we are having chilly mornings so my husband set up the heater. He liked it and asked me to order another one. I never had time to try to set up the wifi until now. IT DOES NOT HAVE THE WIFI BUTTONS! I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit, great WiFi, app with AI
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on reviews from a knowledgeable site. All claims are true. I’m not sure how well the remote works. We use the WiFi on our phones. Our cabin is pretty low tech still but this unit tells us what the current temp is. APP: I programmed some AI to turn on if certain conditions are met like low temperature. (This is not our main heat source but a back up) the AI is tricky at first. “If this.... then....” statements. You are able to share access to family members.
customer_reviews.author: Lis D

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I could have made. I wish I purchased this earlier in the season. My studio only had space heaters which would take hours to heat up. My hours are unpredictable so a timer didnt make sense. This is perfect as I can use my phone to turn it on an hour or two before I get to work and it's nice and toasty when I arrive. My space is 250sq ft with an open door to another unheated 200sq ft,, but even with that draft this unit seems to manage fine. Also it is quieter than any other heater I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Yeishka

customer_reviews.title: UH ?
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Unit failed after only 7 days of intermittent use. Error UH kept shutting unit down. Nothing in manual explains this error. Tech support states this is over voltage fault. Tried various outlets in home with same results. Will be looking for a better quality heater. This must be “get what you pay for” item.
customer_reviews.author: William McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Wall mount version does not come with legs. I let it run a few times on top of my tool chest before committing to mounting it. I felt no heat output. I lift it up and ran it a few more times and I hate to say but it’s going back. The app and WiFi feature is really cool and that was the biggest selling feature. I just finished insulating my 2 car garage. I didn’t have high hopes but I have $30 Honeywell heaters that put out more heat. I would leave it run for hours at an indoor temp of 55 and after five hours on 85 degrees the thermostat would only move a degree.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m not giving this five stars is the instructions to connect the heater to the WiFi. Save yourself a lot of time by watching the YouTube video. Once connected, it was simple to setup the heater to turn on and off automatically through the Alexa app, via the SmartLife app. I had no problems connecting the two apps after finding instructions online to do so. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: shawn  & edna brewster

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing heater. Works well
customer_reviews.text: I set this heater in my garage for bringing my 55 deg garage up to something more bearable in the winter. While I certainly am not balmy warm inside, it no longer hurts to hold wrenches. The reason to get this over a forced air heater is the infrared. It really helps to just stand there and absorb some warmth while not feeling like you're a subway sandwich in the turbo oven. The air filter seems to work well, I grind a lot of metal and it keeps chugging along thus far, (3months). Remote is chintzy but works. Highly recommend wall mounting. The plastic feet seemed kinda meh.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chau

customer_reviews.title: Best heater ever
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this heater buying one more to get the area needed heated . Have in my garage/gym love the fact that it’s WiFi and programmable what’s not to love . Mounting frame to help you hit the mount on point and leveling tool 💥 it heats area where I have pretty quick but need just a little more ! Worth every penny so far
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy!!n
customer_reviews.text: This item is WAY too loud. Can’t believe for the price that they let it make this much noise. I returned it after trying to use it for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best space heater I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: Best space heater I've found yet. Great quality. Superb performance. Works very well. I wish the smart version had feet but mounting them was very easy and I've had no problem with the functionality so far. Had to get a set of replacement feet but the company sent them right out, no hassle. Must buy product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Goff

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORK THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: INSTALLED ON MY WALL WORKED FOR LIKE 3 HOURS AND NOW ONLY COMES ON WHEN IT WANTS TO WOULD RETURN BUT GUESS WHAT WILL HAVE TO REMOVE FROM WALL PATCH AND REPAINT ENTIRE WALL JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Best compact heater on the market!
customer_reviews.text: What a great unit (bought two, wifi enabled). Compact, designed well, and great heat output. Installation is a breeze. Comes with a pre holed/level screw placement. Line it up pop a couple screws in. I have a 1000sqft room with 2 of these guys and it keeps the temp exactly where I need it. For the people saying it cant even warm a <400sqft area I suggest you insulate, put in a ceiling fan to direct the heat back down etc. The unit heats. Great product, going to get another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for any room...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. One in my bedroom in the basement and one in the garage. Both rims are 24X24 and this little guy does a great job. I am in New England and it gets really cold here. This keeps my garage at 60 with no problem. They roughly cost about $20 a month for electricity. I love the fact i can tell google to turn heat on or off, Al what temperature the room is, raise and lower the heat and turn the heater on an hour before i get home. The only feature i wish it had was an energy monitor that i added to monitor the power usage.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Guitano

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought these years ago
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these units for in my garage. We just had a record setting -25 for 2 days and these units were able to keep my garage at 50. On a normal winter day (20 degrees) these keep my garage at 60 no problem and usually don't even switch to high. I am guessing any given day I could turn the thermostat up to 70 and it would easily achieve it. Great buy for under $100.
customer_reviews.author: Paul hansen

customer_reviews.title: Made of cheap thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: This heater had great reviews. And, I purchased because of the reviews. Upon receiving the heater, it is made of cheap thin plastic. Doesn't work as well as indicated, plus the remote did not work on first use even with new battery. Invest your $$ in a better made heater.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This heater is perfect in my bathroom. We mounted it on the wall and I love being able to take a shower in a nice warm room without having to turn up the heat in the rest of the house. We got it to keep the moisture off the walls too and it's great for that! I love the remote and the digital temperature setting. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Most effective space heater to date.
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing! I bought 2 more immediately after using 1. The digital control is accurate, and this units ability to heat and maintain a constant temperature is amazing. Another great feature is that is turns back on if power is interrupted, enabling it to be on a timer. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F. Abbot

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this enough! The previous owners of our house added on a room but didn’t heat it (I don’t know why either), so it was basically unusable four to five months a year. I just turn this on, close the door and in an hour or so the room is toasty and ready to enjoy. My room is about 10 x 7 and this model heats it beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Space heater
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find the right heater for the space I have on my fifth wheel and this is by far the best one I've found so far it puts a great deal heat out it doesn't take up much space I sent back a $600 Dyson because it just didn't do the job one hundred twelve bucks is great highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: David L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Kids' room
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a supplemental heat source in our kids' room. It is quieter than other similar heaters, and it does an amazing job. Their room is on the smaller side (about 10×10). This heater is designed for a much larger space, and as a result the room is easily kept at the desired temperature. We purchased the 1500 with the intent of using it in other applications. We especially like the wifi feature. It is convenient being able to adjust the temperature of the room without entering and potentially waking the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for tiny homes
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater! I have a tiny home and because I can mount it on the wall, it's perfect. I've had it for a couple months now and it's been a trooper. I would suggest that it be mounted low on the wall though. I have mine higher up because of limited useable space and it does take longer to heat my room but that's no fault of the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Carrara

customer_reviews.title: Low output
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed by this heater. It’s more like a heat drip than a heat storm. Even in the high mode, it puts out lukewarm air. Would be ok as a foot warmer under your desk I guess, but it has made no discernible difference in a 16x12 bedroom. Less than 200 sq.ft. It runs nonstop and can’t keep up. It’s not even very cold outside. Product did not meet my expectation. The $40 lasko that I bought at a dept. store works better. Addendum... It actually tripped my breaker while I was writing this review because I had it and another running at once to try to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy, takes 3 hours to heat a 150SQFT room
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older heater of same wattage that could bring my room up to comfortable heat in less to an hour with this thing and it takes over 3 hours. It barely blows any air out of it, and the air coming out is barely warm. Maybe its defective, which is no excuse. Huge regrets
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, wifi is the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so that I could use wifi in order to control the heat before I arrived home. Works perfect, way more cost effective than the old electric radiator style heater I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: i have only had this for a few days. using it in a 20x30 basement room. this unit works great!! smaller than you think. set to 75 and it held the basement at 73 degrees with thermostat recording temps is 1 foot off the floor 30 feet away from the unit. granted it is not 12 degrees outside yet. but im feeling positive about it.
customer_reviews.author: jason salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these heaters that I have purchased. They install on the wall in a snap and the remote a LED screen are easy to read and give you instant feedback on temperature settings. The remote is handy and the heater produces plenty of warmth quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product and am aware of actual cost to run an electric heater. Electric heaters are almost if not 100% efficiency but it gets confused with cost to run. Electric is less bang for your buck as an energy source for heating. This was perfect for a small room in my basement to get rid of the chill. I just wished it had a little more air flow “higher cfm”.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Could not get the unit to communicate WIFI with application Tried two different units
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set up the WIFI communication with the application. Unit would not connect WIFI, Returned the unit and got a replacement. Same problem. Contacted the support people in Utah. They could not find a solution to the problem either. There seems to be something fundamentally wrong with the units software. I do not recommend buying this heater
customer_reviews.author: Barton Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Did its job great all winter. Nice that it turns on/off on it's own. I never liked leaving on other heaters when not home. This I never turn off. It just comes on when needed. I trust it as much as the central unit in the house. I heat my man cave, 400 sq ft, uninsulated 2 car garage, no problem. Not so cold in Texas, but it's a good little heater.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Koonce

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the wireless version so far all is great. Very easy to pair works well easy to program love the child lock feature. I will update once I have had it longer.
customer_reviews.author: TrumpSucks

customer_reviews.title: Good heater but has a noisy fan
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my office for 6+ months and the noise it generates is driving me more nuts every day. Also the app to program the thing is pretty horrible and screams cheapness. Once programmed it is pretty reliable, it heats up my office every weekday from 7:00am onwards. I'm probably going to buy a wall heat panel to take of maintaining the temperature when this heater has done the heavy lifting in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Pieter W

customer_reviews.title: Poor written instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were poorly written. It is too early to know the energy efficiency The instructions do not state or show that the power cord is in a compartment in the rear and the latches are hard to open. The instruction on the installation of the feet are poor. I am a handy man and had no problem .. But any one who is not a handy person would have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin F. Million Jr

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a heater!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little heater, looks good, quiet, wall mount or feet. Does a reasonable job of keeping my studio ~65 F. Also, customer support was very resonsive and helpful when i was too blind to see the feet were stored in the styrofoam shipping packing. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kris edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage
customer_reviews.text: Great for the garage in the winter. We wall mounted it and it maintains the temperature set nicely, cycles off when temp is reached.
customer_reviews.author: rachel thorstenson

customer_reviews.title: Energy bill went up
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to warm up a room. Energy efficiency? Not good at all. My light bill was doubled if not tripled. If it didn’t use so much electricity I would of gave it a 4 at least but right now it’s between at 1 or 2 stars out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best heater money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I must say it’s the best heater I came across Great job guys love it and it’s kids safe which I’m very pleased about. Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: monika

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up my high ceiling bathroom great! I can easily turn off and on from my phone and set schedules.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall heater !
customer_reviews.text: Great heater! For a small 120 sqft insulated sun room it does a phenomenal job of keeping it warm. We have it set at 64 deg and it regulates the temp with energy saving mode 750 w / 1500 w if needed. The blower & remote make it easy to set &forget plus super easy to install ( we placed ours on a brick wall). It does have a small sound associated with its operating but less noisy than the furnace firing up.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Loud blower , big, expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: I dont get the good reviews. A real infrared uses just that to heat not a loud blower. Takes up way to much room and very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hot but very weak fan
customer_reviews.text: Room 15x20 with 11 foot ceiling bathroom takes 110 minutes to go from 65F to 80F. Heat is great. The problem is with fan. Fan is quiet but very weak. With the heat output the fan should be much stronger. Nice to be able to monitor and control with Alexa and/or smart phone. Also nice that it runs on 15A circuit not 20A.
customer_reviews.author: SunsetAir

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: His has helped me a lot. As I can monitor and adjust the temperature in my son’s room, from my bedroom. I have a very spread out house so it’s a long way for me to go from my room to his room and adjust the Room heater in his room. But with this I can do it from my room or remotely using my phone. You don’t really need the remote, it’s a flimsy piece of equipment. It has made my life a little easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil D Jadhav

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not heat as well as the info states Sent back one thought it wasn’t working right, only to find the second one worked the same, might be good for a small room, and as it states use with another heat source ? It’s prob great, I have appx 240sq ft to heat and could never get it above 64, nice heater, quite, just doesn’t seem to heat that well.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Is good but no
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine since confirming with 2 bills on power the energy efficiency I saw advertised didn’t meet my expectations. It cost as much to operate for me as it did to buy it, each month. I’m checking other lower wattage items.
customer_reviews.author: Techparent

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the rest.
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box I was impressed with its sleek design and easy to setup instructions. After the install; this is mounted in my insulated garage, I was able to connect to the WiFi easily. I then cycled between modes, adjusted the temp up/down. The noise this heater generates is very minimal, even on high setting. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: We needed heaters in the bathroom and bedroom for our “mother-in-law” apartment over the garage. I read a lot of reviews before ordering, but I don’t remember the reasons for the lower overall rating. So far, we have been very pleased with this heater. We had been using a larger infrared heater which took up precious floor space. Both are wall hung. Off the floor, yeah! Remote control works well. Heats up the small bathroom quickly before taking a shower so it’s toasty warm. Lights on heater indicate if it is in efficiency mode. We’re pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Cheap, quiet, heats nicely
customer_reviews.text: Second one I’ve purchased. First one is for my mancave of approximately 400 sq ft. Works fantastic!!! Put this one in 500 sq ft studio apartment and my tenant loves it. Barely raised his power bill but definitely lowered his gas bill
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Great value. love moderating temp from Net
customer_reviews.text: love love love this...kept our house warm and was ez to set up....even easy to use thru internet while at work.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have machine for a small apartment maybe 500 square or a little less I have it in and assisted living suite which is 700 square feet total bedroom being separate living room and kitchen combined it sits in between the living room and kitchen being able to access it control it and child lock it from the dementia patient that lives in the room I'm able to keep it at 77 degrees all day everyday perfect alternative for anybody looking for separate heat source
customer_reviews.author: Brent b

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater.
customer_reviews.text: I used this heater to heat up a private home yoga studio and this little heater does the job nicely. Perfect for hot yoga at home. I was able to get my room up to 92°.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Renee

customer_reviews.title: Low heat output
customer_reviews.text: The product isn't a bad design its essentially easy to put up on the wall and it's very light. Other features such as wifi, auto control, & smart home compatibility makes it nice. The only issue is the heat out put is very weak. It can hardly break the chill of a small room and I set the temperature to 90F. Im not sure about energy efficiency yet due to just getting the product but probably won't last long in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best heater I have ever bought. Am using to heat a fairly large room. Heats it like a champ. So I bought 2 more. One for another room in my house, and one for the mother in law
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rentas

customer_reviews.title: Dang!!!
customer_reviews.text: Iv been threw alot of heaters and this one so far is the best one I have chosen. It heats up quick and the way it blows out is the best way. Great product and once it actually starts getting supper cold I’ll update about the heater till then I’m thinking on buying another
customer_reviews.author: Eris

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I wish I would have known about this before hand. I use this in my single car garage to keep it warm in the Seattle area winter and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn F.

customer_reviews.title: Fan stopped working after a month, I could smell burning plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review. Originally it worked well, for about month. The fan broke and it overheated. Started to smell like something was burning and I kept hearing clicking noises. Unplugged it and went to pick it up and the handle was really really hot. I'm lucky it didnt catch on fire and burn my house down. The outside is made with a cheap plastic material, so imagine what the inside is made out of.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in a large outside dog house. It is perfect for them and I don't have to worry about the unit over turning since it is wall mounted. The thermostat keeps the temperature comfortable- not too hot as could happen with a heat lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Knowlton Davis

customer_reviews.title: Garbage heater
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 30 minutes and now it just flashes a light and will not come on.
customer_reviews.author: Jullie M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure as far as the bill really goes but it’s a space heater so nothing is going to be “easy on your bill”. I can tell you that it works really good. Just the right noise level for my sons nursery. Not to Loud but it does make a little bit of noise. I really like it and I will probably be buying more of them. Also love that I can co York it from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mansell

customer_reviews.title: Will buy a second one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! Seriously the best purchase of the year. We will end up buying another one. Our house is old and the heating isn't efficient, but you plug in this, and the room is warm within minutes. We use this in a 300 sq ft addition and It used to be an icebox.. now it is the warmest room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Vallier

customer_reviews.title: Great heat output and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our father in law and it worked so well we bought one for my mom. Was very surprised at the heat output. Super easy to install if you want this on your wall. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mahlon Jensen

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 heatstorm heaters worked fine second was RMA'd thru amazon
customer_reviews.text: First one failed after 17 days and would no longer work over wifi. To be clear the heater worked fine without wifi setup. But once wifi was on the unit repeatedly power cycled. Rma because within the 30 days luckily and second unit (maybe a week in,) is good so far. Will update if it fails again. I have a smaller one that hasnt failed and this one replaced for the downstairs. The smaller one still hasnt any issues, think i just got a bad one with the 1500w model
customer_reviews.author: jewelthief667

customer_reviews.title: Loved it !
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in the basement room. It is quite, convenient and easy to control. The best part it that I can remotely control this unit from anywhere with my phone !
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Manandhar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get over 67° running for 24 hours at 90°
customer_reviews.text: Ran it in a room at 90° and after 24 hours it was still 67°. Doesn't do what i need for it to do. This is for a 4 season insulated room in a cold climate. Although it heats, i need temps over 75°. I would need to run this unit 24/7. For $140 i was hoping for better output.
customer_reviews.author: NettieR

customer_reviews.title: This heater is great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this heater, works great wireless also from your phone app and its also reasonably quiet
customer_reviews.author: Rafi Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Limited Review
customer_reviews.text: I can only review just a little bit as it is not winter yet and I bought them during the summer. I tested both units out and they seem to work as advertised. I hope they are reliable and have longevity.
customer_reviews.author: DEEVCO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! This heater was exactly what we needed to warm our camper at the lake this summer!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small, space efficient, and energy efficient heater to warm our camper this summer on cool nights at the lake. This heater works very well, takes up very little space, and looks great. It is extremely quiet, which is a plus in a small space. It kept our camper comfortable in below freezing weather this winter while we were doing some work inside it!
customer_reviews.author: shellonabon

customer_reviews.title: WISH I new about this long ago...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in my wife's bathroom to preheat in the morning before showering and doing her stupid make up routine for an hour. (Great to be a guy!) Works like a charm and I don't have to worry about her calling me (all the time) to check to see if she turned it off after she has already left for work... not like that EVER happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rost

customer_reviews.title: Deez!
customer_reviews.text: Yeeeeaahhh... Buy something bigger.. This serves its purpose in small rooms, but literally I should have saved my money.. Doesn't come with a stand. Can't use unless you wall mount. Not a bad product, but definitely doesn't heat bbn up the space it claims it does.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Solley

customer_reviews.title: Product works Great
customer_reviews.text: Heater works great at keeping my bathroom nice an heated. It's quiet, excellent design, cell app easy to setup on my phone, wall mount is easy to install with template, The plugin on the heater cord need to be update to a flush mount instead of the old fashion wall plugin.
customer_reviews.author: Randal B.

customer_reviews.title: Depending how good the place is insulated thats how hot the room ...
customer_reviews.text: Depending how good the place is insulated thats how hot the room will get . i live in a basement and since is nothing but brick . the ranges stay at 70 to 75. There times when the tempture outside gets warmer i have to turn off the heater cause i would start to sweat cause it will get to 88. Which i dont mind i like the heat . it dose cool down the room if you set at a set temp
customer_reviews.author: diana Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: On Off, Click, Click, Click! I’m pulling my hair out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater as it seemed it would be quite. It is not. Once it reaches the set temperature, in order to maintain that temperature it noisily turns its fan off and then on, sometimes multiple times within the same 60 seconds. The frequent clicking and change in noise level is more maddening than if the fan just ran constantly. I recommend you stay away from this product unless you want to develop psychoses.
customer_reviews.author: Public User

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I’ve ever purchased. Box says the color gray in two places and white in another place. I ordered white and received gray! Not a big deal except I got it all mounted and then plugged in and nothing at all - doa!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Johnson

customer_reviews.title: excellent temperature control
customer_reviews.text: This heater runs very efficiently and keeps our bed room at the perfect temperature. very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: srap

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the master bedroom. It works great and mounting it to the wall keeps it out of the way so it doesn't become a trip hazard. Also with it mounted to the wall you don't have to worry about knocking it over.
customer_reviews.author: Kweebia

customer_reviews.title: Works great - Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works great and was easy to hook up to network and app.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is AMAZING. It heats small and larger rooms. It’s quiet and efficient. The remote isn’t great. To use it effectively, you need to be very close. But, all in all, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

product_meta.title: Heat Storm HS-1500-PHX-WIFI Infrared Heater, WiFi Wall Mounted
product_meta.description: Color:Wifi Wall MountedThis new Wifi heater will make it easy for you to control the temperature of your wifi unit right from your phone!
feature_bullets: (Wall Mounted Heater Only.) Wi-Fi enabled makes it possible for you to control the temperature from your phone!
Safe to the touch grill. 1500 watts of power
Space saving wall mount design means you don't lose floor space. Perfect for bedrooms, kitchens, offices and more
When installed over the outlet, you can hide the cord inside the heater. This unit stays cool to the touch and the wall stays cool.
Safe to the touch grill. Wall mounted version, Feet not included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,153 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
